courses.course_description: Start your day with our delightful breakfast options, crafted with care to invigorate your senses and fuel your day. From fluffy pancakes drizzled with maple syrup to sizzling bacon paired with golden scrambled eggs, our breakfast menu offers a symphony of flavors to tantalize your taste buds.

sections.section_description: Savor the farm-fresh goodness of our eggs, served with your choice of hash browns or tomatoes (fresh fruit available for an extra burst of flavor) and accompanied by toast or fluffy pancakes.

items.item_description: Enjoy two eggs cooked just the way you like them, served with your choice of sides.
Delight in two eggs cooked to perfection, paired with your choice of crispy bacon, savory sausage links, juicy sausage patties, or flavorful ham.

items.item_name: Two Eggs With Corned Beef Hash
items.item_description: Experience a hearty breakfast with two eggs cooked to order, served alongside our delicious corned beef hash.

sections.section_description: Indulge in our hearty skillets, each topped with two eggs and served with your choice of toast or fluffy pancakes.

items.item_description: Experience a savory medley of ham, bacon, sausage, onions, and hash browns, crowned with a trio of American Swiss, cheddar, and mozzarella cheeses.
Savor the comfort of country fried steak, sautéed onions, and crispy hash browns, smothered in rich sausage gravy and topped with melted cheddar cheese.
Treat yourself to a flavorful blend of skirt steak, caramelized onions, green peppers, mushrooms, and golden hash browns, generously topped with melted mozzarella cheese.
Transport your taste buds to Greece with tender gyros meat, sautéed onions, and crispy hash browns, finished with a sprinkle of tangy feta cheese.
Enjoy a protein-packed skillet featuring grilled chicken breast, fresh broccoli, vibrant green peppers, onions, spinach, tomatoes, and mushrooms.

sections.section_description: Craft your own hearty breakfast with our customizable Lumberjack platter. Choose your eggs, meat, and sides to create a meal that satisfies your cravings.

items.item_description: Enjoy three eggs cooked to perfection, prepared just the way you like them.
Select your preferred meat option: crispy bacon, succulent sausage links, flavorful sausage patties, or country-style ham slices.
Pair your meal with your choice of crispy hash browns or a refreshing fruit salad.
Indulge in your favorite breakfast carb: two fluffy pancakes, two slices of French toast, a golden waffle, or two slices of toast (white, wheat, or rye).
Complete your breakfast experience with a comforting side: half order of biscuits & gravy or a piping hot bowl of oatmeal.

sections.section_description: Join The Breakfast Club and enjoy our satisfying breakfast combos, each featuring a harmonious blend of pancakes, eggs, bacon, and links.

items.item_description: Indulge in a classic breakfast feast with two fluffy pancakes, two eggs cooked to perfection, and a generous serving of two strips of crispy bacon and two savory sausage links.
Satisfy your sweet cravings with half a serving of delectable French toast, paired with two eggs, two strips of bacon, and two savory sausage links.
Enjoy a crispy Belgian waffle accompanied by two eggs, two strips of bacon, and two savory sausage links, creating a perfect balance of sweet and savory flavors.
Indulge in the comforting flavors of biscuits and gravy with half a serving, paired with two eggs, two strips of bacon, and two savory sausage links.

items.item_name: Full Biscuits & Gravy, 2 Eggs, 2 Bacon, 2 Links
items.item_description: Delight in the ultimate breakfast comfort food with a full serving of biscuits and gravy, complemented by two eggs, two strips of bacon, and two savory sausage links.

sections.section_description: Indulge in a satisfying breakfast with two eggs served alongside golden hash browns and your choice of toast or fluffy pancakes.

items.item_description: Treat yourself to a tender and flavorful skirt steak, expertly grilled to perfection and served with two eggs, hash browns, and your choice of toast or pancakes.
Savor the juicy goodness of our succulent pork chops, seasoned to perfection and served with two eggs, crispy hash browns, and your choice of toast or pancakes.
Indulge in a classic favorite - country fried steak smothered in rich sausage gravy, served with two eggs, golden hash browns, and your choice of toast or pancakes.

sections.section_description: Indulge in our flavorful omelettes, each served with your choice of hash browns or tomatoes (fresh fruit available for an extra burst of flavor) and accompanied by toast or fluffy pancakes.

items.item_description: A hearty omelette filled with bacon, sausage, ham, onions, green peppers, and mushrooms, generously smothered in savory sausage gravy.
A garden-fresh omelette bursting with broccoli, green peppers, onions, tomatoes, and mushrooms, perfectly complemented by melted cheddar cheese.
Enjoy a classic Denver omelette featuring ham, green peppers, onions, and creamy American cheese.
Indulge in a delightful combination of fresh spinach and tangy feta cheese folded into a fluffy omelette.

Embark on a culinary journey with our South of the Border omelette, filled with spicy chorizo, melted cheddar cheese, and topped with zesty pico de Gallo and a creamy crema drizzle. Served with a side of salsa.
For the carnivore in you, indulge in an omelette loaded with ham, bacon, sausage, onions, and melted American cheese.
Take your taste buds on a Mediterranean adventure with our Spartan omelette, featuring gyro meat, fresh spinach, onions, tomatoes, and creamy feta cheese.

sections.section_description: Indulge in our M&Y Favorites, served with hash browns (fresh fruit available for an extra burst of flavor).

items.item_description: Experience the flavors of Greece with gyros meat and onions scrambled in eggs, folded in a warm tortilla with tangy feta cheese. Served with a side of tzatziki sauce.
Savor the bold Tex-Mex flavors with skirt steak scrambled in eggs, mixed with cheddar cheese, and served with vibrant pico de Gallo and a creamy crema drizzle. Comes with chips and salsa.
Enjoy a hearty breakfast with bacon, sausage, ham, and onions scrambled in eggs, wrapped in a tortilla with melted cheddar cheese. Served with a cup of savory sausage gravy.
Indulge in the perfect blend of sweet and savory with crispy chicken drizzled in hot honey, served atop fluffy waffles.
Satisfy your avocado craving with smashed avocado, cherry tomatoes, everything bagel seasoning, and creamy feta cheese, all topped with a balsamic glaze drizzle.
Classic breakfast elegance awaits with an English muffin topped with ham, perfectly poached eggs, and velvety hollandaise sauce.
Delight in a healthy twist on a classic with an English muffin, filled with ham, spinach, perfectly poached eggs, and drizzled with hollandaise sauce.
Enjoy a handheld delight with scrambled eggs, crispy bacon, and melty American cheese, sandwiched between grilled sourdough bread.
Indulge in breakfast decadence with three eggs, sliced ham, and gooey American cheese, all nestled within a flaky croissant.
Wake up your taste buds with scrambled eggs, spicy chorizo, and melted cheddar cheese, topped with fresh pico de Gallo, creamy crema, and served with chips and salsa.

sections.section_description: Elevate your pancakes with fresh fruit toppings for an extra burst of flavor (choose from strawberries, blueberries, or bananas).

items.item_description: Indulge in a berry lover's dream with fluffy pancakes topped with fresh strawberries, blueberries, blackberries, whipped cream, and a drizzle of vanilla sauce.
Satisfy your pancake cravings with a towering stack of fluffy pancakes, served with butter and maple syrup.
Enjoy a classic favorite with fluffy pancakes studded with rich chocolate chips, served with butter and maple syrup.
Experience the crunch of pecans in every bite with pancakes filled with chopped pecans, served with butter and maple syrup.
Delight in a decadent combination of sliced bananas, caramel drizzle, and chopped pecans atop fluffy pancakes, served with butter and maple syrup.
Indulge your sweet tooth with fluffy pancakes filled with crushed Oreo cookies, topped with whipped cream and chocolate sauce.
Treat yourself to a delightful combination of chocolate chip pancakes topped with crunchy pecans and a luscious caramel drizzle.

sections.section_description: Indulge in our delectable waffles, each offering a unique twist on a classic favorite.

items.item_description: Savor the classic Belgian waffle, perfectly golden and crisp on the outside, fluffy on the inside. Served with butter and maple syrup.
Experience the perfect blend of crunch and sweetness with our pecan waffle, loaded with chopped pecans and served with butter and maple syrup.
Treat yourself to a decadent delight with our banana royale waffle, topped with fresh banana slices, creamy ice cream, whipped cream, and drizzled with luscious chocolate syrup.
Embark on a culinary adventure with our waffle flight, featuring three pearl sugar waffles served with a variety of toppings to tantalize your taste buds.

sections.section_description: Elevate your French toast experience with our delightful offerings. Fresh fruit available for an extra burst of flavor.

items.item_description: Indulge in our decadent French toast topped with a medley of fresh berries, fluffy whipped cream, and a drizzle of vanilla sauce.
Savor the timeless delight of our classic French toast, perfectly golden-brown and dusted with powdered sugar, served with butter and maple syrup.
Treat yourself to a heavenly combination of creamy Nutella spread and sliced bananas sandwiched between slices of French toast, served with a dusting of powdered sugar.
Experience indulgence with our stuffed French toast, filled with a luscious sweet cream cheese filling, and served with butter and maple syrup.
Delight your taste buds with our French toast topped with fresh strawberries and a velvety vanilla cream drizzle, creating a perfect harmony of flavors.

sections.section_description: Indulge in our delicate crêpes, filled with a variety of delicious ingredients.

items.item_description: Savor the freshness of our crêpes filled with your choice of juicy blueberries, ripe strawberries, or sliced bananas, creating a burst of fruity flavor with every bite.
Experience the irresistible combination of creamy Nutella spread enveloped in warm crêpes, creating a decadent treat that will satisfy any sweet craving.

sections.section_description: Enjoy our shareable delights, perfect for grabbing on the go or sharing with friends.

items.item_description: Indulge in our crispy French toast sticks, served with a decadent icing dip for a delightful sweet treat.

Satisfy your savory cravings with our breakfast nachos, featuring crispy chips topped with melted cheddar cheese, spicy chorizo, flavorful pico de Gallo, scrambled egg, and a creamy crema drizzle. Served with salsa on the side.
Delight in the classic goodness of our freshly baked cinnamon roll, swirled with cinnamon sugar and topped with rich icing.

courses.course_description: Indulge in our delicious sandwiches, each crafted with fresh ingredients and bursting with flavor.

sections.section_description: Wrap up your cravings with our flavorful wraps, served with a bowl of soup, French fries, and a pickle spear.

items.item_description: Savor the combination of savory turkey, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy ranch dressing wrapped in a soft flour tortilla.

Enjoy the spicy kick of chicken tenders tossed in buffalo sauce, paired with crisp lettuce, juicy tomato, and melted cheddar cheese, all wrapped in a warm flour tortilla. Served with your choice of ranch or blue cheese dressing.

sections.section_description: Experience the comforting warmth of our pressed sandwiches, served with a side of soup, French fries, and a pickle spear.

items.item_description: Indulge in our Chicken Pom Panini featuring tender chicken breast and crispy bacon layered with Swiss cheese and mayo, perfectly grilled between slices of sourdough bread.
Savor the classic flavors of our Club Panini, with savory turkey and crispy bacon, topped with melted cheddar cheese and mayo, all pressed between slices of grilled sourdough bread.

Transport yourself to the flavors of Chicago with our Da Chicago Panini featuring thin-sliced roast beef, creamy American cheese, mayo, and onions, perfectly grilled between slices of sourdough bread.

sections.section_description: Get into the brunch mood with our delicious sandwiches, served with a side of soup, French fries, and a pickle spear.

items.item_description: Indulge in our classic Monte Cristo featuring savory ham and Swiss cheese dipped in French Toast batter and grilled golden brown.
Satisfy your cravings with slices of juicy skirt steak, grilled onions, green peppers, and melted mozzarella cheese, all nestled between slices of Vienna bread.
Enjoy a taste of Philadelphia with our Philly Chicken sandwich, featuring grilled chicken breast, onions, green peppers, mushrooms, and melted mozzarella cheese on Vienna bread.
Experience the bold flavors of our Italian Beef Sandwich, with thin slices of prime beef piled high on Vienna bread, served with a side of giardiniera for an extra kick.
Classic meets delicious with our BLT sandwich, featuring crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, juicy tomato, and creamy mayo on toasted bread.
Savor the combination of tender turkey, crispy bacon, fresh lettuce, ripe tomato, and creamy mayo, served on two slices of toasted bread.
Transport your taste buds to Greece with our Gyros Sandwich, featuring flavorful gyros meat, pita, sliced onions, and a side of homemade tzatziki sauce.
Spice up your meal with our Buffalo Chicken sandwich, featuring a deep-fried chicken breast soaked in zesty buffalo sauce.
Treat yourself to our Chicken Bacon Avo sandwich, featuring tender chicken breast topped with crispy bacon, creamy avocado, and melted Swiss cheese.

courses.course_description: Experience the satisfaction of our flavorful burgers, crafted with care and served with a side of soup, French fries, and a pickle spear. Upgrade to Onion Rings available. Options to make it a DOUBLE or add bacon for an extra indulgence.

sections.section_description: Indulge in our hand-smashed burgers, made to perfection.

items.item_description: Savor the simplicity of our classic American burger featuring a pure ground beef patty topped with creamy American cheese.
Delight your taste buds with our Western Burger, featuring a juicy ground beef patty topped with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, crunchy onion rings, and tangy BBQ sauce.

Experience the perfect blend of sweet and savory with our Maple & Yolk Burger, featuring a succulent ground beef patty topped with crispy bacon, flavorful Cheddar Jack cheese, and a perfectly fried egg.
Enjoy a twist on a classic with our Patty Melt, featuring a smashed ground beef patty on grilled marble rye bread, complemented by savory grilled onions and melted American cheese.

courses.course_description: Indulge in our fresh and flavorful salads, perfect for a light and satisfying meal.

sections.section_description: Savor the goodness of our garden-fresh salads, served with a bowl of soup and your choice of dressing.

items.item_description: Enjoy a delightful combination of fresh greens, crispy breaded chicken breast, cucumber, creamy avocado, cherry tomatoes, and shredded cheddar cheese.
Transport your taste buds to Greece with our Greek Salad, featuring crisp greens topped with refreshing cucumbers, juicy cherry tomatoes, briny olives, and tangy feta cheese.

Delight in our Chef Salad, featuring a medley of fresh greens topped with savory ham, tender turkey, creamy American and Swiss cheese, crisp cucumbers, juicy cherry tomatoes, and a perfectly boiled egg.

courses.course_description: Complement your meal with our delectable side dishes, perfect for adding a little extra flavor to your dining experience.

sections.section_description: Complement your meal with these irresistible sides.

items.item_description: Crispy golden fries seasoned to perfection.
Golden brown hash browns cooked to crispy perfection.
Classic French fries served hot and crispy.
A fresh and crisp mix of greens, cucumbers, and cherry tomatoes, served with your choice of dressing.
Warm up with a comforting bowl of our soup of the day.
A hearty bowl of oatmeal served with brown sugar and raisins. Add fresh berries for an extra burst of flavor.

courses.course_description: Quench your thirst with our refreshing beverage options, perfect for pairing with any meal or enjoying on their own.

sections.section_description: Choose from a variety of beverages to complement your meal.

items.item_description: Enjoy a refreshing soda in your favorite flavor.
Cool off with a tall glass of our freshly brewed iced tea.
Indulge in the southern classic with our perfectly sweetened iced tea.
Start your day off right with a refreshing glass of orange or apple juice.
Savor the rich flavor of our freshly brewed coffee, available in regular or decaf.
Warm up with a comforting cup of hot tea.
Indulge your sweet tooth with a steaming mug of hot chocolate.
Enjoy a classic glass of cold milk.
Treat yourself to the creamy goodness of chocolate milk.
Indulge in the rich flavor of espresso blended with steamed milk, available in Plain, French Vanilla, or Mocha.
Get a quick caffeine boost with a shot of espresso.
Add some sparkle to your brunch with our refreshing mimosas, available in Original, Peach, or Strawberry flavors.

courses.course_description: Treat your little ones to delicious meals designed just for them.

sections.section_description: Kid-friendly meals that will put a smile on their faces.

items.item_description: A fun-shaped pancake served with 2 bacon strips or 2 sausage links.
Golden brown French toast sticks served with icing for dipping.
A classic cheeseburger served with a side of fries.
Tender chicken strips served with a side of fries.
Melted cheese sandwiched between two slices of toasted bread, served with fries.
